Name: readiness_assessment
Description:
completion of the application
rationalization readiness assessment

Name: identify_requirements
Description: identification of applications performing core mission services and applications providing support or other supplementary functions
Notes: 1 indicates that agency has developed a Requirements Landscape

Name: questionnaire
Description: creation of agency-specific list of questions that captures all relevant financial, business, and technical information and reporting requirements for each application
Notes: Questionnaire provides the foundation for Application Rationalization

Name: questionnaires_sent
Description: number of in-scope program offices that received the same questionnaire

Name: CPIC_report
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and CPIC report(s)
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: financial_reporting_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via financial reporting tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: authorization_to_operate_lists_and_management_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via authorization to operate lists and management tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: cybersecurity_assessment_and_management_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via cybersecurity assessment and management tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: SLO_tools_and_inventories
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via SLO tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: CMDB_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via CDDB tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: CDM_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via CDM tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: COOP_and_DR_plans
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via COOP and DR plans
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: DCIM_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via DCIM
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: data_management_systems
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via data management systems
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: hardware_tracking_systems
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via hardware tracking systems
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: licenses_SLAs
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via licenses and SLAs
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: security_operations_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via security operations tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: SAM_tools
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via security and operations tools
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: virtualization_management_system
Description: determination of inventory discrepancy between questionnaire responses and inventory as ascertained via virtualization management systems
Notes: 1 indicates a disparity between questionnaire responses and information from existing inventory sources

Name: application_onboarding
Description: creation of a new application onboarding process, wherein the relevant information captured in the questionnaire is reported for all new applications purchased from vendors or developed by or for the agency
Notes: 1 confirms creation of application onboarding process

Name: effectiveness
Description: the degree to which an application is a solution for the goal agencies are trying to achieve
Values:
very low effectiveness
low effectiveness
moderate effectiveness
high effectiveness
very high effectiveness

Name: mission_criticality
Description: the degree to which an application is critical in supporting and executing the agenciesâ€™ mission
Values:
very low mission criticality
low mission criticality
moderate mission criticality
high mission criticality
very high mission criticality

Name: utilization
Description: the degree to which an application is used
Values:
very low usage
low usage
moderate usage
strong usage
high usage

Name: complexity
Description:
the degree of customization, unique features, and functions enabled by an
application
Values:
very low complexity
low complexity
moderate complexity
high complexity
very high complexity

Name: usability
Description: the degree of ease for the user to operate or learn how to use an application
Values:
very low usability
low usability
moderate usability
high usability
very high usability

Name: technical_requirements_bandwidth
Description: the level of bandwidth required for an application to run, in megabits per second (mbps)

Name: technical_requirements_data
Description: the level of data required for an application to run, in petabytes (PB)

Name: version_control
Description: number of official application updates within a given year

Name: dependencies_upstream_exist
Description: determination of the presence of code, databases, and functionality on which the application depends

Name: dependencies_downstream_exist
Description: determination of the presence of the code, databases, and functionality that depend on the application

Name: scalability_adaptability
Description: the degree to which an application can be scaled to onboard new users and can it be augmented to fit the needs of new user groups
Values:
very low scalability/adaptability
low scalability/adaptability
moderate scalability/adaptability
high scalability/adaptability
very high scalability/adaptability

Name: security_standards
Description: the degree to which an application is protected against security attacks and conforms to agency risk tolerance models
Values:
very low security standards
low security standards
moderate security standards
high security standards
very high security standards

Name: dependencies_upstream_identity
Description: determination of the code, databases, and functionality on which the application depends

Name: dependencies_downstream_identity
Description: determination of the code, databases, and functionality that depend on the application

Name: duplication
Description: review of the application inventory for duplication

Name: TCO
Description: the sum of current-state direct and indirect costs associated with owning and operating an application over a given year

Name: OpEx_internal_labor
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with internal labor force, including wages, benefits, expenses, occupancy, and other expenses

Name: OpEx_external_labor
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with external labor force, including contractor fees, travel, and other expenses

Name: OpEx_outside_services
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with outside services, including consulting, managed service providers, and cloud service providers

Name: OpEx_outside_services_consulting
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with external consulting services

Name: OpEx_outside_services_managed_service_providers
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with external, managed service providers

Name: OpEx_outside_services_cloud_service_providers
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with external cloud service providers, including IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS

Name: OpEx_software
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with software, including non-capitalized software purchases, leases, maintenance and support, and depreciation

Name: OpEx_software_expense
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with non-capitalized software purchases

Name: OpEx_software_licensing
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with non-SaaS software licensing

Name: OpEx_software_maintenance_support
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with software maintenance and support

Name: OpEx_software_depreciation
Description: annual depreciation of capitalized software purchases

Name: OpEx_hardware
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with physical hardware assets, including non-capitalized hardware purchases, leases, maintenance and support, and depreciation

Name: OpEx_hardware_expense
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with non-capitalized hardware purchases

Name: OpEx_hardware_lease
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with hardware leases

Name: OpEx_hardware_maintenance_support
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with hardware maintenance and support

Name: OpEx_hardware_depreciation
Description: annual depreciation of capitalized hardware purchases

Name: OpEx_facilities_and_power
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with facilities and power, including operating expenses, leases, maintenance and support, and depreciation

Name: OpEx_facilities_and_power_expense
Description: annual expenses associated with space, power, and security, and other miscellaneous operating expenses

Name: OpEx_facilities_and_power_lease
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with data center leases

Name: OpEx_facilities_and_power_maintenance_and_support
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with data center maintenance and support

Name: OpEx_facilities_and_power_depreciation
Description: annual data center depreciation related to facility build and leasehold improvements

Name: OpEx_telecom
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with telecom, including expenses, leases, maintenance and support, and depreciation

Name: OpEx_telecom_expense
Description: annual operating expenses associated with space, power, and security, and other miscellaneous operating expenses

Name: OpEx_telecom_lease
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with telecom leases

Name: OpEx_telecom_maintenance_and_support
Description: annual operating expenditures associated with telecom maintenance and support

Name: OpEx_telecom_depreciation
Description:
annual depreciation of capitalized telecom
expenditures

Name: OpEx_other
Description: annual miscellaneous operating expenditures

Name: OpEx_internal_services
Description: annual charges from other intragovernmental groups that provide shared services

Name: CapEx_internal_labor
Description: annual expenditures for internal labor above the capitalization threshold

Name: CapEx_external_labor
Description: annual expenditures for external labor above the capitalization threshold

Name: CapEx_hardware
Description: annual hardware expenditures above the capitalization threshold

Name: CapEx_software
Description: annual software license expenditures above the capitalization threshold

Name: CapEx_outside_services
Description: annual expenditures for outside services above the capitalization threshold

Name: CapEx_facilities_and_power
Description: annual expenditures related to land, facilities, and capitalized improvements, including capitalized expenditures related to power

Name: CapEx_telecom
Description: annual expenditures related to telecom assets above the capitalization threshold

Name: IT_Tower_data_center
Description: annual expenditures associated with purpose-built facilities for computer equipment

Name: IT_Tower_data_center_enterprise
Description: annual expenditures associated with purpose-built facilities required to operate and protect data centers

Name: IT_Tower_data_center_other facilities
Description: annual expenditures associated with general purpose office space/buildings used to house IT equipment

Name: IT_Tower_compute
Description: annual expenditures associated with general and special-purpose devices and software, including direct costs of hardware, software, labor, and outside support services

Name: IT_Tower_compute_servers
Description: annual expenditures associated with physical and virtual servers, including direct costs of hardware, software, labor, and outside support services

Name: IT_Tower_compute_unix
Description: annual expenditures associated with servers that run Unix-based operating systems, including direct costs of hardware, software, labor, and outside support services

Name: IT_Tower_compute_midrange
Description: annual expenditures associated with servers running on an IBM AS/400 platform, including direct costs of hardware, software, labor, and outside support services

Name: IT_Tower_compute_converged_infrastructure
Description: annual expenditures associated with purpose-built appliances that combine compute, storage, and network capabilities into a single package

Name: IT_Tower_compute_high_performance
Description: annual expenditures associated with HPC

Name: IT_Tower_compute_mainframe
Description: annual expenditures associated with purpose-built mainframe computers

Name: IT_Tower_storage
Description: annual expenditures associated with centralized storage for all applications, excluding internal storage on servers and end-user devices

Name: IT_Tower_storage_online
Description: annual expenditures associated with online storage resources required for distributed compute infrastructure, including hardware, software, and labor costs.

Name: IT_Tower_storage_offline
Description: annual expenditures associated with offline storage resources required for archive, backup, and recovery to support distributed compute infrastructure

Name: IT_Tower_storage_mainframe_online
Description: annual expenditures associated with mainframe storage arrays, including direct costs of required hardware, software, and labor.

Name: IT_Tower_storage_mainframe_offline
Description: annual expenditures associated with offline storage resources for archive, backup, and recovery processes to support mainframe storage

Name: IT_Tower_network
Description: annual expenditures associated with data and voice equipment, and corresponding transport methods

Name: IT_Tower_network_LAN_WAN
Description: annual expenditures associated with LAN and WAN equipment, labor, and support services

Name: IT_Tower_network_voice
Description: annual expenditures associated with on-premises voice resources

Name: IT_Tower_network_transport
Description: annual expenditures associated with data and voice network circuits and corresponding facilities and services

Name: IT_Tower_platform
Description: annual expenditures associated with distributed and mainframe databases

Name: IT_Tower_platform_database
Description: annual expenditures associated with distributed database services that emphasize the physical database, including DBAs, DBMS, tools, and operational support

Name: IT_Tower_platform_middleware
Description: annual expenditures associated with distributed platform, application, and system integration resources

Name: IT_Tower_platform_mainframe_database
Description: annual expenditures associated with mainframe database services that emphasize the physical database, including DBAs, DBMS, tools, and operational support

Name: IT_Tower_platform_mainframe_middleware
Description: annual expenditures associated with mainframe platform, application, and system integration resources

Name: IT_Tower_platform_container_orchestration
Description: annual expenditures associated with tools and resources required for container orchestration

Name: IT_Tower_platform_big_data
Description: annual expenditures associated with integrating, managing, and analyzing big data

Name: IT_Tower_output_central_print
Description: annual expenditures associated with central printing services

Name: IT_Tower_end_user
Description: annual expenditures associated with end user devices and support for end users

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_workspace
Description: annual expenditures associated with desktop and laptop computers, monitors, personal printers, and other peripherals

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_mobile
Description: annual expenditures associated with smartphones, tablets, and apps

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_end_user_software
Description: annual expenditures associated with the software used by individuals to create and collaborate on documents and other content

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_network_printers
Description: annual expenditures associated with network (non-personal) printers

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_conference_AV
Description: annual expenditures associated with audio and video conferencing equipment

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_help_desk
Description: annual expenditures associated with a centralized Tier 1 IT help desk

Name: IT_Tower_end_user_deskside_support
Description: annual expenditures associated with deskside support to resolve IT issues

Name: IT_Tower_application
Description: annual expenditures associated with application development, support and operations, and licensing, maintenance, and support

Name: IT_Tower_application_application_development
Description: annual expenditures associated with application analysis, design, development, code, test, release packaging services, and quality assurance

Name: IT_Tower_application_support_operations
Description: annual expenditures associated the operation and support of existing applications

Name: IT_Tower_application_business_software
Description: annual expenditures associated with licensing, maintenance, and support of off-the-shelf business software

Name: IT_Tower_delivery
Description: annual expenditures associated with enterprise-wide monitoring, support, management, and operations

Name: IT_Tower_delivery_services_management
Description: annual expenditures associated with incident, problem, and change management activities, excluding Tier 1 help desk activities

Name: IT_Tower_delivery_program_product_project_management
Description: annual expenditures associated with managing and supporting IT-related projects, and with continuous development of IT-related products

Name: IT_Tower_delivery_client_management
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT account managers or other similar personnel

Name: IT_Tower_delivery_operations_center
Description: annual expenditures associated with a centralized IT operations center, including monitoring and intervention activities

Name: IT_Tower_security_compliance
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT security compliance and disaster recovery

Name: IT_Tower_security_compliance_security
Description: annual expenditures associated with establishing, implementing, and controlling security policy, processes, and means, determining compliance, responding to security breaches, and maintaining real-time operational security

Name: IT_Tower_secuity_compliance_compliance
Description: annual expenditures associated with establishing, implementing, and controlling policy, processes, and means, and measuring compliance in accordance with legal and regulatory requirements

Name: IT_Tower_security_compliance_dr
Description: annual expenditures associated with disaster recovery, including activities related to policy, processes, means, failover facilities, and testing

Name: IT_Tower_IT_management
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT management and strategic planning, enterprise architecture, IT finance, and IT vendor management

Name: IT_Tower_IT_management_IT_management_strategic_planning
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT management and strategic planning, typically including the CIO, senior IT leaders, and additional administrative support

Name: IT_Tower_IT_management_enterprise_arch
Description: annual expenditures associated with enterprise architecture services, including activities to help standardize, integrate, and improve the efficiency of IT solutions

Name: IT_Tower_IT_management_IT_finance
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT finance including planning, budgeting, spend management and chargeback of IT expenditures, and the costing of IT products and services

Name: IT_Tower_IT_management_IT_vendor_management
Description: annual expenditures associated with IT vendor management, including vendor selection, contract management, oversight, and performance management

Name: certifications
Description: annual expenditures related to employee certifications

Name: reassignments
Description: annual expenditures related to employee reassignments

Name: HR
Description: annual HR-related expenditures associated with onboarding new employees and leveraging HR offices for change management processes

Name: IT_training
Description: annual expenditures associated with training of current employees and hiring of new employees

Name: software_patching
Description: annual expenditures associated with manual software patching

Name: ATO
Description: annual expenditures associated with attaining ATO(s)

Name: outlier
Description: presence of cost outlier(s) in the application inventory
Notes: 1 confirms presence in the agency's IT portfolio

Name: scoring_methodology
Description: scoring methodology used to implement an application rationalization strategy
Example: Gartnerâ€™s Tolerate, Invest, Migrate, Eliminate (TIME) methodology

Name: application_score
Description: agency-defined ranking or merit scale

Name: communications_strategy
Description: creation of a communications strategy that enables stakeholders to learn about the scoring process, understand how information will be shared, and provide feedback

Name: review
Description: presence of applications with low business value and high technical fit
Notes: 1 confirms presence in the agency's IT portfolio

Name: reward
Description: presence of applications with high business value and high technical fit
Notes: 1 confirms presence in the agency's IT portfolio

Name: refresh
Description: presence of applications with high business value and low technical fit
Notes: 1 confirms presence in the agency's IT portfolio

Name: remove
Description: presence of applications with low business value and low technical fit
Notes: 1 confirms presence in the agency's IT portfolio

Name: hosting_options
Description:
determination of hosting options based on future-state TCO, improved service
delivery, and customer satisfaction

Name: assessing_current-state_cost
Description: annual up-front costs associated with assessing the current-state

Name: planning_migration_costs
Description: annual up-front costs associated with migration planning

Name: stakeholder_costs
Description: annual up-front costs associated with attaining stakeholder buy-in

Name: parallel_systems_costs
Description: annual up-front costs associated with running parallel systems

Name: vendor_management_costs
Description: annual up-front costs associated with vendor management

Name: training_reskilling_costs
Description: annual up-front costs associated with training and reskilling

Name: refactoring_replatforming_cost
Description: annual up-front costs associated with refactoring and replatforming existing applications

Name: migration_strategy
Description: creation of an IT migration strategy that includes a communications strategy, a vendor management plan, a workforce development plan, and a migration timeline, and that attains buy-in from key stakeholders
